DOC.brief_summary: The purpose National Breast Cancer Lymphedema Registry collect health information order study lymphedema complication breast cancer treatment . The investigator hope learn whether early diagnosis help prevent lymphedema , occur , reduce severity .

The condition measurable , substantial impact patient function perceive quality life ( QOL ) . Recent pilot study suggest intervention design facilitate early diagnosis preventive strategy major impact incidence severity disease burden . This registry design prospectively capture relevant data document impact preemptive diagnostic treatment strategy .
